_header: An angel she sent to him anon
Note:
Cf. another version in Mirk’s Festial: Erbe (1905)
XErbe, Theodore. Mirk’s Festial.
EETS e.s. 96 (1905); repr. 1987, 234.
_description: The clerk blinded by the glory of the Virgin Mary — 200 lines in 12-line stanzas, ababababcdcd

NLS1921.First Lines:
…[An an]gel sche sent to him anon[He] gret þe clerk
                    wiþ milde steuen…
NLS1921.Last Lines:
…Bring ous for þine ioies fiueInto þe swete blis of
                    heuen
NLS1921.Note:
Portion of f. 37 cut away, with loss of beginings of lines in second
                    column, verso.
